acp.store

Class RankDataStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • acp.store.RankDataStore

  • public class RankDataStore
extends java.lang.Object
    RankDataStore handles the creating of the file that stores the user behaviors as well as retrieving and storing of the user behavior at the start of ACP and end of ACP respectively.
    Author:
    Ng Chin Hui

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RankDataStore()
      Default Constructor

    • Constructor Detail

      • RankDataStore

        public RankDataStore()
        Default Constructor

    • Method Detail

      • testing_mode

        public void testing_mode()
        To enable testing mode for JUnit Test cases.

      • retrieveRankData

        public void retrieveRankData()
        Retrieves past user behavior data from file. The method retrieves all the data from the file and stores it into temporary store variables. This method is called once at the start of ACP.

      • storeUserBehaviour

        public void storeUserBehaviour()
        Stores user behavior data into the file. The method stores all the data that are in the two temporary store variables into the file. This method is called once at the end of ACP.

      • updateDocumentList

        public void updateDocumentList(java.lang.String source,
                      double score)
        Updates the variables that are used as temporary store for user behavior data during runtime.
        Parameters:
        source - the name of the source document
        score - the score of the source document

      • removeDocumentFromList

        public void removeDocumentFromList(int index)
        Removes the entry from temporary store variables for user behavior data during runtime.
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the entry in the temporary store variable (documentLsit)

      • getDocumentList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getDocumentList()
        Gets the list of document. One of the two temporary store variables.
        Returns:
        the list of documents

      • getScoreList

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Double> getScoreList()
        Gets the list of scores. One of the two temporary store variables.
        Returns:
        the list of scores
